channel.title: Removing pickpocketing option [PI]
channel.description:
Yes I understand am a member since 2008, but I've just recently got back into coding.
Basically, I removed the full thieving skill from my f2p server... Now the problem is the 'pickpocket' option still appears where do I find that, so I can remove it? And no it's not client based...
Help would be really appreciated :D

item.title: Removing pickpocketing option [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Diesel1 Diesel.
item.description:
@Diesel1 wrote:

Search all your server files for “pickpocket” and remove anything that shows.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing pickpocketing option [PI]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

For me it was in client.java (server sided) just search for ‘Pickpocket’

Read full topic
